T02D2617:88b-1: n'a ma sam g'i ti b'a tsa no pa de sham /
T02D2617:88b-3: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog pa'i man ngag
T02D2617:88b-4: /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2617:88b-5: // dus gang yang rung bar khrus dag par byas la /
T02D2617:88b-6: bsam gtan gyi khang par ba stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2617:88b-7: rang gi snying gar pad zla'i steng du yi ge mu:dmar ser bsgom mo //
T02D2617:88b-8: de las 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs can 'phros pas
T02D2617:88b-9: 'og nas 'chad pa'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang ldan
T02D2617:88b-10: pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal spyan drangs la /
T02D2617:88b-11: yan lag bdun pa rgyas par bya //
T02D2617:89a-2: 'di dag snying rje'i sa bon no //
T02D2617:89a-3: shes rab kyis bon byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags sva bh'a ba brjod la /
T02D2617:89a-4: nam mkha' lta bu'i stong pa nyid la yun ring du gnas par bya //
T02D2617:89a-5: stong pa'i ngang las yi ge h'um mthing nag bsam
T02D2617:89a-6: zhing de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse
T02D2617:89a-7: lnga pa'i lte ba la zla ba'i steng du h'um
T02D2617:89a-8: gnas par bsam / de 'od du zhu ba las logs rnams la rdo rje'i ra ba /
T02D2617:89a-10: 'og tu gsar gyis gzhi la thug pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yod pa /
T02D2617:89a-11: rdo rje'i 'od kyis ra ba'i phyi rol gyi phyogs mtshams bcing ngo //
T02D2617:89a-12: 'di ni srung ba'i 'khor lo ste phyi rol gyi
T02D2617:89a-13: 'od kyis bgegs sreg par byed la nang gi rdo
T02D2617:89a-15: ra ba'i nang du bgegs kyis mi thar bar bsam /
T02D2617:89a-16: de nas rdo rje'i nang du hr'i: dkar po yongs
T02D2617:89a-17: su gyur pa las padma de'i steng du aa yongs
T02D2617:89a-18: su gyur pa las zla ba de'i steng du yi
T02D2617:89a-19: ge mu: dmar ser cig bsam /
T02D2617:89a-20: de las 'od zer rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dbyibs can
T02D2617:89a-21: dpag tu med pa 'phros pas snod bcud thams cad
T02D2617:89a-22: la reg pas de dag kyang 'jam dbyangs su gyur
T02D2617:89a-23: nas tshur 'dus pas mu:la thim par bsam /
T02D2617:89a-24: de yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dbyangs sku mdog
T02D2617:89a-25: dmar ser zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa
T02D2617:89a-26: / phyag bzhi pa zhal gsum pa'i zhal g-yas nag
T02D2617:89a-27: po g-yon dkar po dbus dmar po spyan gnyis gnyis
T02D2617:89a-28: / yod pa / phyag g-yas kyi dang po na ral gri /
T02D2617:89a-29: gnyis pa na mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2617:89a-30: g-yon gyi dang po na pu sti /
T02D2617:89a-31: gnyis pa na gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D2617:89a-32: dbu la rin po che'i thor tshugs yod pa /
T02D2617:89a-33: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba /
T02D2617:89a-34: dpe byad bzang po brgyang cus spras pa /
T02D2617:89a-35: rin po che'i rgyan du mas mdzes pa /
T02D2617:89a-36: shin tu gzhon she dang bcas pa'i sku kyi phung po rab tu 'bar bar bsgom mo //
T02D2617:89a-37: de'i thugs kar pad zla'i steng du rdo rje sems
T02D2617:89a-38: ma dkar mo phyag g-yon pa dril bu dkur brten
T02D2617:89a-39: pa g-yas kyis rdo rje thugs kar bsnams pa /
T02D2617:89a-40: mdzod spu la rin chen rdo rje ma sku mdog
T02D2617:89a-41: ser mo phyag gnyis kyis dbu la me tog gi
T02D2617:89a-43: mgrin par padma rdo rje ma sku mdog dmar ser
T02D2617:89b-0: phyag g-yon gyis @89b padma kha zum pa'i yu ba
T02D2617:89b-1: nas bzung zhing g-yas kyis rgyas par mdzad pa /
T02D2617:89b-2: skra mtshams su las kyi rdo rje ma sku mdog
T02D2617:89b-3: ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dpral bar brten
T02D2617:89b-4: par bsgom mo // de nas thugs ka nas 'od
T02D2617:89b-5: zer 'phros nas ngag tu aom badzra aam ku sha
T02D2617:89b-6: par bsgom mo // dza:/ zhes brjod la ye shes
T02D2617:89b-7: sems dpa' mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te
T02D2617:89b-8: mchod pas mnyes par byas la aom badzra aam ku
T02D2617:89b-9: par bsgom mo // dza:/ sha dza:/ zhes brjod pas dgug / aom badzra a'a sha h'um /
T02D2617:89b-10: zhes pas gzhug / aom badzra spho ta bam /
T02D2617:89b-11: zhes pas tha mi dad par bsam /
T02D2617:89b-12: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:/
T02D2617:89b-13: zhes pas dgyes par bsam mo ;
T02D2617:89b-14: / yang 'od zer 'phros te rgyal ba rigs lnga'i
T02D2617:89b-15: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spyan drangs la sangs
T02D2617:89b-16: rgyas rnams kyi phyag tu rin po che'i bum pa
T02D2617:89b-17: bsnams te spyi bo nas bdud rtsis dbang bskur bas
T02D2617:89b-18: nang du zag med kyi bde ba chen po skyes
T02D2617:89b-19: / phyir chu lhag ma yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2617:89b-20: mi bskyod pa sku mdog nag po rigs kyi dbu
T02D2617:89b-21: / brgyan no // de nas rdo rje khu tshur dang rdo rje'i phyag gya bya /
T02D2617:89b-22: 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar reg go //
T02D2617:89b-23: de dag tshar nas gzhung klog pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2617:89b-24: phan yon dang bcas te 'don na legs /
T02D2617:89b-26: thog mar zhabs kyi sngags tshar gcig 'don /
T02D2617:89b-27: dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i rjes la sngags tshar gcig / mjug tu tshar gcig ste /
T02D2617:89b-28: mtshan brjod tshar re la sngags lan gsum gsum 'don /
